span.p:
Subcategorization:
רצה requires infinitive
Transitivity:
לקנות requires noun object

span.p: ① Round-trip ② Grammar ③ Lexicon\n④ Simplicity ⑤ Specificity ⑥ Frequency\n⑦ Gematria ⑧ Tense ⑨ Affix minimality

span.p: Filter invalid:\nה + verb = INVALID\nDouble prefix = INVALID
